name: generateCsr
description: Generates a new private key and returns a base64 encoded PKCS#10 certificate signing request (CSR).

$ul: **csr**: Base64 encoded PKCS#10 certificate signing request. The request should start with -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----.

**hostnames**: A comma-separated list of host names that are associated with the certificate. This list accepts wildcard hostnames, such as '*.rubrik.example.com', in addition to fully-qualified domain names.
**name**: Display name for the generated CSR.
